title: Integrate Mediator NuGet package into Application project
description:
Integrate the Mediator package from https://github.com/martinothamar/Mediator into the backend Application project. This includes:
- Adding the Mediator NuGet package dependency
- Configuring DI container to register handlers
- Setting up Mediator service registration  
- Updating routers to use Mediator for sending commands
- No tests required for initial integration
